title: Process Federal Payroll Tax Deposits
description: A business needs to make its semi-weekly federal payroll tax deposit.

tasks.description: Calculate the total payroll tax liability (employee withholding + employer taxes) for the recent payroll.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the total amount to be deposited.

tasks.description: Log in to the Electronic Federal Tax Payment System (EFTPS).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully accesses the EFTPS portal.

tasks.description: Schedule the tax deposit for the correct amount and date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the payment to be made on time.
